text: Nathan Matthews claimed it was an
accident that he hadn't meant to kill
his stepsister Shawn a [ __ ] who was
pregnant at the time
insisted she had nothing to do with it
but the jury did not believe them
it took them just three hours to decide
the pair had conspired to kidnap
sixteen-year-old Becky Watts and that
they killed her in a sexually motivated
attack finally just as it's been done
for a beautiful Becky
after hearing weeks of harrowing
evidence about how the school girl was
killed her family gave their reactions
to today's verdicts now the formalities
have been concluded we can begin the
process of breathing properly and
rebuilding our lives lives that could
never ever be the same
she was a beautiful happy funny
feisty caring loyal and witty girl she
was like a tornado hurricane and Sunbeam
all at once she came into your life and
made you feel alive listening Becky's
dad Darren and his wife Angie they now
know that his daughter was murdered by
her son when they married two years ago
Becky was their young bridesmaid Nathan
Matthews was the best man and the other
bridesmaid was Shauna Hall it was the
19th of February this year when Matthews
and hor drove to Becky's house armed
with a stun gun
Becky was alone in her bedroom a
pathologist said she was suffocated here
after fighting for her life in a violent
struggle Matthews who'd been in the
territorial army told the jury he put
Becky's body in a suitcase and then the
couple drove back to their home two
miles away when they got here
Nathan Matthews and Shauna [ __ ] ordered
a takeaway and watched a comedy video on
YouTube entitled do you want to hide a
body they then began the process of
hiding Becky's remains the next morning
twenty-eight-year-old bought a circular
saw then together they bought tape
rubble sacks and cleaning products when
police searched their home they found
every room filled with junk and mess
apart from the bathroom which was
spotlessly clean this is where Becky's
body had been dismembered her remains
had then been packaged into bags and
cases and hidden in a neighbor's shed
the circumstances of this case are truly
horrific their gruesome and they are
grotesque you know to dismember a human
body is a very very unusual occurrence
and for it to happen in these
circumstances after a stepbrother kills
his stepsister is just despicable and
brutal the jury heard that nathan
matthews and shana hor had a shared
sexual interest in teenage girls and had
exchanged messages about kidnapping in
the months before they killed Becky the
pair will be sentenced on Friday
